product_name: SportHill Crescent-Heather Knee Tights - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Versatile for all your high-octane activities, the women's SportHill Crescent-Heather Knee Tights feel light and comfortable, wick moisture and dry fast for comfort. SwiftDry Heather polyester/elastane wicks, dries fast and breathes with ease. Lined gusset and chafe-free seams. Flat, wide waistband has center-back zippered pocket and internal key/card pocket. SportHill Crescent-Heather Knee Tights for women have a reflective logo on the right hem. Special buy.
short_description: Versatile for all your high-octane activities, the women's SportHill Crescent-Heather Knee Tights feel light and comfortable, wick moisture and dry fast for comfort.
